items.title: Korona Mozi
items.summary: As virtual continuation to "Bobvárosi Mozi" event series, we started "Korona Mozi", that, yes, you guessed, happens online. Stay tuned for latest news!
items.content_html:
As virtual continuation to "Bobvárosi Mozi" event series, we started "Korona Mozi", that, yes, you guessed, happens online.

Stay tuned for latest news!

items.title: We've gone virtual!
items.summary: Due COVID-19 pandemic our regular meetups are not happening. Hence, we went fully virtual. You can reach us via Contact page.
items.content_html: Due COVID-19 pandemic our regular meetups are not happening. Hence, we went fully virtual. You can reach us via Contact page.

items.title: Web Site Launched!
items.summary: We are thrilled to announce: Language Swap Web Site is alive! The site will grow as our free time allows to maintain it.
items.content_html:
We are thrilled to announce: Language Swap Web Site is alive!

The site will grow as our free time allows to maintain it.

Or, it may remain just as a call-card, we will see, but time will say!
